targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(fecha,10s),
  SensorT1
FROM datos
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(fecha,10s)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(fecha,10s),
  SensorT1
FROM datos
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(fecha,10s)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(fecha,10s),
  minimo AS "Temp. Mín",
  SensorT1,
  maximo AS "Temp Máx."
FROM tanque1
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(fecha,10s)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(fecha,10s),
  Alarma
FROM tanque1
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(fecha,10s)
